content.rendered:
Limited Edition 2021
43%, 700ml
For the Blossom Harmony, the blenders at Suntory married Hibiki liquid with Sakura cask finished whisky, allowing us to explore their fine craftsmanship from a completely new angle.
Hibiki Blossom Harmony 2021 released in limited quantities on May 25th 2021.
